content.raw:
Is this pull request mostly a proof of concept, and there will be others coming? 

Right now the only supported classes are also available in Ruby's standard library, and I think the real benefit here would be to introduce Ignition Math specific classes, like `Inertial` and `MassMatrix3`.

I'm asking because the original pull request mentioned that not all C++ functionality would be supported, so I wonder where the line lies.
